title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.24 - Construction of doors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.24 - Construction of doors

State Regulations

In factory buildings erected after October 1, 1913; in
mercantile establishments in buildings erected after November 1, 1920. Construction of hoistway doors shall conform to the
specifications provided in section
8-1.62. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-1.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
